Content: Even though we try our best, there are some small issues in the game:
do not delete parts holding the X key. This makes the game crash.
When connecting something to a wheel after the wheel part has been placed, different joints are created,
and the wheel will behave differently (not really a bug).
Also, do not place smaller wheel at the sides of double frames or other large parts,
because the length of the spring of a wheel is relative to the center of its parent part.
sometimes, bigger wheels completey destroy the physics simulation.
the origin of this bug is unknown, but we will work on fixing it.
